
== Shortcuts ==

==== Navigation ====

* Move window to *{ Position }* where *HJKL* are the direction (capitol):
  * <C-W><C-*{Position}*>
* Switch windows
  * <C-W><w> 

==== Terminal ==== 
* Open Terminal in new window:
  * :split/vsplit | terminal
* Close Terminal:
  * <C-\><C-n>

==== VimWiki ====

* Cheatsheet: 
  * https://gist.github.com/drkarl/4c503bccb62558dc85e8b1bc0f29e9cb  

* Copy and replace:
  * :%s/*{find}*/*{replace}*/g
  * find is what string you are looking for
  * replace is what you are going to replace the string with
* Switch tab window 
  * <gt> or <gT>
